Lint/DuplicateBranch.description:
Description

Checks that there are no repeated bodies within `if/unless`, `case-when` and `rescue` constructs.
Lint/DuplicateBranch.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

IgnoreLiteralBranches: False (type: bool)
IgnoreConstantBranches: False (type: bool)
IgnoreDuplicateElseBranch: False (type: bool)
